resources.b1d: By installing the application, working with OsMo, share your location easily
resources.b2d: When you start the transmission of the coordinates generated links of the form https://osmo.mobi/s/**_***_** it works until you stop the session
resources.b3d: If you need to give the opportunity to have constant access to your location to someone - create a permanent link, it will always show your location while sending coordinates. She works forever, as long as it does not remove.
resources.gtk0: Every time you start and stop monitoring in our system submitted in a separate trip "session"
resources.gtk1: At the same time not one authorized device or one account can have only one running session monitoring
resources.gtk2: During the session, within 24 hours after its inception, should be sent at least one coordinate, otherwise it is considered empty and will be removed
resources.gtk3: The maximum number of points per session ~200 000, then the session is forcibly terminated by the system
resources.gtk4: If not authorized, the device does not send coordinates within 12 hours, session monitoring is automatically closed
resources.gtk5: If the account is not received coordinate within 36 hours, the monitoring session is automatically closed.
resources.gtk6: If the majority of the points sent in the last 24 hours with zero speed - the session is considered useless, and the device can be locked
resources.session_ended_description: To continue to observe this unit you can ask for a link to a new session, the permanent link or log in with a user in one group
